name: canshare-who-haematology-histiocytic-other-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid histiocytic dendritic cell neoplasm other histology
description: Histologies used for histiocytic and dendritic cell neoplasms not dendritic cell or blastic plasmacytoid dendritic cell (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours) or an 'Other' value.
